CustomField.description: Depending on whether the user is a primary applicant, business co-owner, co-borrower or guarantor, or other involved entity, their context record populates with a Context Type. Context Type determines the UI workflow the user experiences in the online application.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The context type indicates whether the user is a primary applicant (Applicant), a business co-owner (Owner), or a co-borrower or guarantor (Other Involved [Individual].)
CustomField.label: Context Type
